alert.note: Alert for Marion; Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 7:22PM EDT until July 22 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Marion County in northern Florida... South central Putnam County in northeastern Florida... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 722 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake Delancy, or 10 miles west of Pomona Park, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Marion and south central Putnam Counties, which includes Welaka. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
